headline.main: State Guard Moves Ahead; Enthusiastic in Spite of Handicaps, It Could Use More Men

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: Much publicity and recognition are rightly being given to the organization and activities of civil defense and other emergency agencies, such as the Air Raid Wardens, Auxiliary Firemen and Women's Volunteer Service. These organizations have been fortunate in the degree to which they have caught public interest and have thereby kindled the fires of patriotic enthusiasm.
abstract: Lr urging more recognition and increased enlistment
